15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated An-Nu'man bin Bashir:That his father gave a slave to a son of his. So he went to the Prophet (ﷺ) to have him witness it. He (ﷺ) said: 'Have you given a gift similar to this one to all of your sons?' He replied: 'No'. So he said: 'Then take him back

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النُّحْلِ وَالتَّسْوِيَةِ بَيْنَ الْوَلَدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Gifts And Equality Between Children
